directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: A year-end options expiry for bitcoin is suppressing volatility just as macro and risk-asset positioning turns supportive for a higher...
Bitcoin slips over 2% as weak demand and low confidence reinforce selling pressure and keep the long-term downtrend intact.
Gold, silver, and platinum hit record highs as Bitcoin struggles. Analysts watch for a 2026 capital rotation into crypto.
Bitcoin's price was unable to break above $90000 convincingly and is once again found into a retracement.
Bitcoin price has oscillated between a mid-range support level and an upper resistance band below a key overhead level, with multiple...

hypothesis_content.title: BTC Weekly Range Breakout with Options Expiry Catalyst
hypothesis_content.statement: A daily close above $90,200 (resistance) or below $85,500 (support) following the weekly options expiry will trigger a directional move of at least 3% in the same direction within the next 3 trading days, as pent-up gamma hedging pressure is released.
hypothesis_content.rationale: BTC is consolidating in a defined range with a major options expiry acting as a volatility catalyst. A clean break of a technical level post-expiry often sees follow-through as dealers adjust delta hedges and trapped positions are forced to cover.
entry_conditions: BTC daily candle closes > $90,200 (for long) OR < $85,500 (for short)
Condition occurs within 24 hours of the weekly Friday options expiry (8:00 AM UTC)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Return and close back inside the $85,500-$90,200 range
exit_conditions.time_exit: 72 hours after entry if TP/SL not hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: A daily close beyond the range fails to generate a 3% follow-through move within 3 days on more than 40% of occurrences, indicating false breakouts or insufficient momentum.
